page.title: 15GAMES
page.content: Some widely known games which we play are football, rounders, slaps, conkers, hop-scotch, tig (off ground, 40 40), bull-dog, skipping and cat & mouse. We also play the following games: Piranhas: players jump from raised object to object. If they touch the ground they are out. Mother May I: a kind of "Simon Says". Polo: a category of things is given to the players by one player who stands at the other end of the "track" facing them. The players give one example of this category each. The player who is "it" and the person whose item has been shouted race to opposite ends of the track and shout "Polo" when they finish. Other games we play are: Hop,hop,hop to the Gollywog shop, Eggy Peggy, Vandaliser and Red Rover.
